name: Gloom

passive.name: Harvest Feast
passive.effect: Once during your turn, you may discard as many Grass Energies as you like from your Pokemon. For each Energy discarded this way, remove 1 damage counter from the Pokemon it was attached to.

flavor: Gloom overdosing is a serious crime in Celadon City after numerous outbreaks. Their odor stinks over many miles, so it was easy for the police to crack down on.
